description:
The apartment was recently renovated and we're the first to call it home. 

Highlights include: 

- Hardwood floors
- Working fireplace
- Tempur-Pedic mattress
- Stocked kitchen
- Large bedroom + bathroom 
- Awesome artwork and elegant mid-century furniture 
- Stainless steel appliances in the kitchen
- Two large closets
- And more...

We're located close to Barclay's and BAM. The bottom floor of the building is also Convivium Osteria, perhaps the finest restaurant in all of New York.
name: Beautiful + Private 1 Bedroom in North Park Slope
